s: March 12, 2025 - Shortly after, Patch Products grew with the acquisition of Onaroo, previously owned by American Innovative, LLC. This brand allowed Patch Products to expand into a new, complementary category of children's room décor. In February, Patch Products changed its name to PlayMonster.

s: Company Description: PlayMonster (formerly Patch Products) doesn't see any problem with being all fun and games. The company makes board games, coloring books, activity kits, foam sports toys, playing cards, and puzzles under the Lauri, Patch, and Smethport brands.
